step_data.thought: I have clicked on the navigation menu to see if there is a 'Sale' or 'Discounted Products' category, but it seems that the menu does not provide a direct link to such categories. I will now check the 'Compare Products' section to see if there are any products listed there, which might have been marked as discounted.
